net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Macro_createAdvDisadvMacroFamily
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Given a macro config for a macro allowing advantage and disadvantage (Saves, Ability Checks, Attacks),
this macro will create the "family" of macros.

arg (0) = macro name ("Strength Save", "Scimitar Attack", etc)
arg (1) = command
arg (2) = command object (JSON)
arg (3) = macroConfig
